import React from 'react' function VideoDetails(props) { return (

{props.videoDetailsData.title}

By {props.videoDetailsData.channel}

{props.dateConverter(props.videoDetailsData.timestamp)}

{/*

{new Date(props.videoDetailsData.timestamp).toLocaleDateString()}

*/}

{props.videoDetailsData.views}

{props.videoDetailsData.likes}

{props.videoDetailsData.description}

) } export default VideoDetails
